channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: CCPD, ISSS to Hold “Working in the U.S.: CPT and Internships” Session for Undergraduate Students
item.description: Date: Friday, January 31, 2025 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM - Register to join the Center for Career and Professional Development (CCPD) and International Services for Students and Scholars (ISSS) for an in-person workshop to learn about the internship search and the ways to get Curricular Practical Training (CPT) to work in the U.S. before graduation! This session has information that is specific to undergraduate students.
item.author: Students

item.title: RPI Outdoor Programs to Lead Full Moon Hike February 12
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 12, 2025 6:00 PM - 10:00 PM - Sign up to join RPI Outdoor Programs at Grafton Lakes State Park, to experience the unique sights, sounds and feelings one may have hiking at night!
item.author: Students

item.title: Career Fair Prep with CCPD Peer Career Advisors to be Held February 4
item.description: Don’t miss this opportunity from 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM on Tuesday, February 4 to get insider advice from students who’ve been in your shoes and are now working at the CCPD to help you succeed. Register on Handshake and then bring your questions and get ready to walk into the career fair with confidence!
item.author: Students

item.title: RPI Spirit Day is January 31!
item.description: Date: Friday, January 31, 2025 (all day) - Grab your favorite RPI spirit gear and get ready for this year’s Spirit Day! Just snap a photo in your best red on your preferred social media with #RPISpiritDay2025, or submit your photo via bit.ly, then plan to join us at the Union Horseshoe at 11:30 a.m. on Spirit Day with your spirit gear for a group photo, and to enjoy giveaways and free snacks!
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Hold Graduate Certificates Review
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 5, 2025 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., as he highlights the range of Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs. Three courses in length and developing targeted ability groups, these certificates can be completed in as little as seven months.
item.author: Community

item.title: Be a Part of the Spirit Day Photo on January 31!
item.description: Date: Friday, January 31, 2025 11:15 AM - 11:30 AM - Don’t forget to wear your best RPI gear and meet at the Union Horseshoe this Friday for the Annual Spirit Day photo!
item.author: Community

item.title: Journalist Anna Clark to Speak as Part of CEE Seminar Series
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 5, 2025 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM - Titled “Poisoned City: Flint’s Water Crisis,” this discussion will explore how it came to be that a Great Lakes city learned that its own water was a threat; the Flint water crisis was a man-made disaster that, in many ways, is still unresolved.
item.author: Community

item.title: TIAA to Offer Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling February 3
item.description: Date: Monday, February 3, 2025 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits!
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Fidelity to Offer Confidential In-Person Retirement Consultation February 6
item.description:
Date: Thursday, February 6, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - Schedule a confidential consultation to become better informed and more confident about your workplace retirement savings plan benefits!
